description: This table contains charge-based surcharge information.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: QUAL_CHG_TX_ID
columns.description: List of charges that were used to calculate Surcharge in "Taxable Charges Only" calculation.

columns.name: SURCHARGE_PERCENT
columns.description: The percent applied in order to calculate surcharge for the specific charge.

columns.name: SURCHARGE_AMT
columns.description: The amount of tax for this charge to be applied to the total surcharge on the account.

columns.name: TAX_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Tax classification used to determine the rate used in the "Taxable Charges" surcharge calculation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Non-Taxable


Taxable
